query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'finanzamt_dokumente' AND COLUMN_NAME IN ('dateiUrl', 'dateiName');
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 45EyxYVJKxfKNgq.1ad1f92e0c93 --database a9gxiKPEnvhSyNwyoY3SX5 --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'finanzamt_dokumente' AND COLUMN_NAME IN ('dateiUrl', 'dateiName');
stdout:
COLUMN_NAME	DATA_TYPE	CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH
dateiUrl	text	65535
